name: Custom Plugin Python
description: Comprehensive developer roadmap plugin featuring 7 specialized agents, covering 65+ roles from frontend development to AI engineering with hands-on projects and skill assessments
author: Developer Roadmap Team

agents.name: Frontend & Web Technologies Agent
agents.description: Specializes in frontend development, web frameworks, and web technologies covering React, Vue, Angular, Next.js and modern web stack

agents.name: Backend & Database Agent
agents.description: Focuses on backend development, databases, cloud infrastructure with PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Docker, Kubernetes and microservices architecture

agents.name: Data, AI & Machine Learning Agent
agents.description: Guides through data science, machine learning, AI engineering, MLOps with practical implementations and AI systems development

agents.name: DevOps & Infrastructure Agent
agents.description: Covers DevOps practices, cloud platforms, infrastructure as code, system design, and enterprise deployment strategies

agents.name: Design & Product Management Agent
agents.description: Specializes in UX/UI design, design systems, product management, and technical writing for holistic product development

agents.name: Security & Blockchain Agent
agents.description: Focuses on cybersecurity, ethical hacking, blockchain development, and secure architecture design

agents.name: Programming Languages & Fundamentals Agent
agents.description: Teaches core programming languages (Python, JavaScript, Go, Rust, Java, C++) and CS fundamentals for strong foundation

commands.name: roadmap
commands.description: Choose your learning roadmap and get personalized guidance

commands.name: agent-guide
commands.description: Get specialized guidance from domain expert agents

commands.name: skill-assessment
commands.description: Assess your knowledge and get recommendations

commands.name: project-builder
commands.description: Explore hands-on projects and build your portfolio
